ssot__Survey__dlm.name: Survey
ssot__Survey__dlm.description: The Survey DMO represents a structured set of questions that collects information or feedback from respondents.

ssot__ActiveSurveyVersionId__c.description: A reference ID to the active version for the survey.

ssot__CreatedDate__c.description: The date the record was created.

ssot__DateSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name for a system that is the source of records identified by external record ID.

ssot__DateSourceObjectId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name of the object where this record came from, whether that is a name of a cloud storage file or another connectorâ€™s external object.

ssot__InternalOrganizationId__c.description: A reference ID to the business unit or other internal organization that owns the survey.

ssot__LastModifiedDate__c.description: The date when a user last modified the record.

ssot__NamePrefix__c.description: The name prefix of the survey.

ssot__Id__c.description: A unique ID used as the primary key for the survey DMO.
